mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER (ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDRESS_CODE, MEMBER_ADDRESS_BASIC, MEMBER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, MEMBER_PHONE_NUMBER, MEMBER_PASSWORD) VALUES (#{id},#{memberName},#{memberPhoneNumber},#{memberEmail},#{memberAddressCode},#{memberAddressBasic},#{memberAddressDetail},#{memberPassword})
